name: Cube Mission
description: Cube mission is a fun isometric action platforming puzzler. Travel through a floating world with all kinds of different obstacles and precarious puzzles. This journey can be enjoyed by anyone looking for an amusing, challenging and rewarding adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Graphics Storage: 125 MB available space
